summary: REQ-14/15/16 appear implemented in the modified Courses and Course Detail pages: Enroll Now navigates to /courses/$courseId, INR formatting is used, an invalid courseId shows a Course Not Found state with Back to Courses, and descriptions are rendered without obvious truncation/clamping with responsive layouts. However, additional unrequested global “cyber-themed” styling utilities/classes were added in index.css (and related references), which are not part of the BuildRequest.

hallucinated_features.description: Added/expanded global “cybersecurity theme” styling and component utility classes (e.g., cyber-button, cyber-card, nav-link, code-line animations) not requested by REQ-14/15/16.
hallucinated_features.reason: BuildRequest is limited to course navigation + responsive layout + no truncation + INR formatting; it does not request a site-wide theme overhaul or new animated/utility classes.
evidence: frontend/src/index.css (adds cyber-themed color tokens and classes: .cyber-button, .cyber-card, .nav-link, .code-line, etc.)
